
### How publish Python package to PyPi ###

	python setup.py sdist
    twine upload dist/*

Follow the step from [How to upload your python package to PyPi](https://medium.com/@joel.barmettler/how-to-upload-your-python-package-to-pypi-65edc5fe9c56)
